alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Hale; Marengo; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 7:35PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Marengo, central Perry, south central Hale and northern Dallas Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 734 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Faunsdale, or 7 miles northwest of Uniontown, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Valley Grande, Marion, Uniontown, Newbern, Faunsdale, Vaiden, Paul M Grist State Park, Marion Junction, Perry County Correctional Center, Judson College, Radford, Summerfield, Suttle, Sprott, Vaiden Field Airport, Laneville and Barrett Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for south central, central, southwestern and west central Alabama.
